definitions.definition: to give a particular job or piece of work to someone:
examples: [ + two objects ] UN troops were assigned the task of rebuilding the hospital.

definitions.definition: If you assign a time for a job or activity, you decide it will be done during that time:
examples: Have you assigned a day for the interviews yet?

definitions.definition: If you assign a characteristic or value to something, you say that it has it:
examples: Each visitor to the site chooses an online alter ego, which is assigned a name.

definitions.definition: to decide a reason for something:
examples: Detectives have been unable to assign a motive for the murder.
